availableFunds(uint256,address).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream for which to query the balance.
params.who: The address for which to query the balance.

returns.balance: The total funds allocated to `who` as uint256.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to withdraw tokens from.

getStream(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to query.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

terminateFlow(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.  Throws if the caller is not the sender or the recipient of the stream.  Throws if there is a token transfer failure.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to close.

timeElapsed(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream for which to query the delta.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CloseStream(uint256,address,uint256,uint.notice: Emits when a stream is successfully closed and tokens are transferred back on a pro rata basis.

PauseStream(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emits when a stream is successfully paused.

ResumeStream(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emits when a stream is successfully resumed.

SetNewRecipient(uint256,address,address).notice: Emits when the recipient of a stream is successfully changed.

TokenRegister(address,uint256).notice: Emits when a token is successfully registered.

availableFunds(uint256,address).notice: Returns the available funds for the given stream id and address.

claimFromFlow(uint256).notice: Withdraws from the contract to the recipient's account.

getStream(uint256).notice: Returns the stream with all its properties.

terminateFlow(uint256).notice: close the stream and transfers the tokens back on a pro rata basis.

timeElapsed(uint256).notice: Returns either the delta in intervals between `block.timestamp` and `startTime` or  between `stopTime` and `startTime, whichever is smaller. If `block.timestamp` is before  `startTime`, it returns 0.
